StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: INSERTSTUDENT
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE GRUPO10.INSERTSTUDENT(pFirstName IN VARCHAR2, pSurname IN VARCHAR2,&lt;br/&gt;pTitle IN VARCHAR2, pAddress IN VARCHAR2, pPhone IN NUMBER, pPostcode IN NUMBER,&lt;br/&gt;pCampusLocation IN VARCHAR2, pYear IN NUMBER) AS&lt;br/&gt;BEGIN&lt;br/&gt; INSERT INTO Student_table &lt;br/&gt; VALUES(Student_obj(sequenceStudentID.Nextval, pSurname, pFirstName, pTitle, pAddress, pPhone, pPostcode, pCampusLocation, pYear));&lt;br/&gt; COMMIT;&lt;br/&gt;END insertStudent;
